title: Stargate Upgrade- Second time is a charm!
description:
Proposal to complete the Stargate upgrade, halt `cosmoshub-3` at 06:00 UTC on Feb 18th, export the state and start `cosmoshub-4` based on gaia 4.0.

 Gaia Commit hash: 
 a279d091c6f66f8a91c87943139ebaecdd84f689  Proposal details can be found on 
 github: https://github.com/cosmos/governance/pull/13 
 Rendered: https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmTkzDwWqPbnAh5YiV5VwcTLnGdwSNsNTn2aDxdXBFca7D/example#/ipfs/QmSYu8wWX7b6CgDHhbH13xjNRqEmJ54iyf5vXkpAGuHMAy 
 ipfs: https://cloudflare-ipfs.com/ipfs/QmSYu8wWX7b6CgDHhbH13xjNRqEmJ54iyf5vXkpAGuHMAy
